name: Bothan
description: A simple wrapper around MongoDB to allow storage of time series metrics.

METRICS_API_TITLE.description: The title of your Bothan instance - i.e. 'My Awesome Metrics'

METRICS_API_DESCRIPTION.description: The description for your Bothan instance

METRICS_API_LICENSE_NAME.description: The name of license you are releasing your data under - see http://licenses.opendefinition.org/#all-licenses for a list

METRICS_API_LICENSE_URL.description: The url of license you are releasing your data under - see http://licenses.opendefinition.org/#all-licenses for a list

METRICS_API_PUBLISHER_NAME.description: The name of the organisation who is publishing this data

METRICS_API_PUBLISHER_URL.description: The website of the organisation who is publishing this data

METRICS_API_CERTIFICATE_URL.description: The URL of the Open Data Certificate for your data

METRICS_API_USERNAME.description: The username you will need to provide when adding metrics

METRICS_API_PASSWORD.description: The password you will need to provide when adding metrics
